You have to use a test's run(TestResult) method, i.e. 
1. get your test instance (suite or test case)
2. create a test result, e.g. new TestResult()
3. create your TestListener instance
4. call addTestListener() with your test listener instance.
5. call the run(TestResult) method on your test instance

hope that helps,
Johannes
